simple.gui.factory

Class TextFactory

  • java.lang.Object
    • simple.gui.factory.TextFactory

  • public final class TextFactory
extends Object
    Creates Fonts and sets up StyledDocuments.
    Created: Mar 6, 2009
    Author:
    Kenneth Pierce

    • Method Detail

      • makeFont

        public static Font makeFont(String name,
            int size)
        Creates a plain font.
        Parameters:
        name - Name of the font wanted.
        size - Point size of the font.
        Returns:
        A new java.awt.Font that represents a font with point size size that has the name name.

      • getMonoFont

        public static Font getMonoFont()
        Returns MONOSPACE.

      • getMonoFont

        public static Font getMonoFont(int size)
        Creates a font of point size size derived from MONOSPACE.
        Parameters:
        size - Point size the font should be.
        Returns:
        MONOSPACE.deriveFont(size)

      • addStylesToDocument

        public static void addStylesToDocument(StyledDocument doc,
                       String font,
                       int size)
        Adds a plain, bold, italic, small, and large style to the document. Small is 2 points smaller than the base size. Large is 2 points larger then the base size.
        Parameters:
        doc - The document that these will be added to.
        font - The font family. null defaults to SanSerif.
        size - The font size. 0 defaults to 12.

      • addStylesToDocument

        public static void addStylesToDocument(StyledDocument doc,
                       String font)
        Adds a plain, bold, italic, small, and large style to the document. Small is 2 points smaller than the base size. Large is 2 points larger then the base size.
        Parameters:
        doc - The document that these will be added to.
        font - The font family. null defaults to SanSerif.

      • addStylesToDocument

        public static void addStylesToDocument(StyledDocument doc,
                       int size)
        Adds a plain, bold, italic, small, and large style to the document. Small is 2 points smaller than the base size. Large is 2 points larger then the base size.
        Parameters:
        doc - The document that these will be added to.
        size - The font size. 0 defaults to 12.

      • addStylesToDocument

        public static void addStylesToDocument(StyledDocument doc)
        Adds a plain, bold, italic, small, and large style to the document. Small is 2 points smaller than the base size. Large is 2 points larger then the base size.
        Parameters:
        doc - The document that these will be added to.
